comment: You know what made the difference when you touched your toes while sitting with straight legs? By taking a deep breatch in, you lifted your upper body before breathing out and bending down. When you do that (stretch your upper body upwards), you create more space for you to be able to bend over. Also the breathing in while lifting up and breathing out while bending over is helpful. And yes, if you do this everyday, you will get better at it!
